column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Where do i even begin. I am from California on a road trip
column2: decided to stop here and grab a bite
column3: one of the greatest decisions I have ever made. Amazing food! Amazing staff specially our server Laura! Had a great time! The food is beyond great! Ate so much
column4: everything was amazing except the wait
column5: and that's because I hate waiting. But it was absolutely worth it! Garlic bread was so good. The pizza was just the best I have ever had
column6: I don't think it could get any better
column7: and remember to look for Laura
column8: she's very helpful and a great server.
